data.name: Failure_Message
data.comment: This is a failure message for invalid service response

data.name: Feedback_and_Support
data.value: [Enter Redirect URL for Feedback and Support, e.g. mailto:support@supportsite.com]
data.comment: Redirect URL for Feedback and Support

data.name: Mail_Cart_Mail_Subject
data.comment: Subject of the mail required as part of mail cart feature

data.name: MatterLandingPageExtension
data.comment: This is the file extension of the Matter Landing page

data.name: Matter_Provision_App_Link
data.comment: This is used to add link to the global navigation matter provision tab

data.name: NoResults_Message
data.comment: This is a message for no result scenario

data.name: No_Data_String
data.comment: This is displayed when string is null or whitespace

data.name: OneNoteTableOfContentsExtension
data.comment: This is the file extension of the OneNote table of contents

data.name: Search_Assigned_To_Me
data.comment: This text is displayed on auto-complete search options for Search Documents

data.name: Search_Documents
data.comment: This is used to check if Search Documents is loaded in Web Dashboard

data.name: Search_Entire_DMS
data.comment: This text is displayed on auto-complete search options

data.name: Search_Matters
data.comment: This is used to check if Search Matters is loaded in Web Dashboard

data.name: Search_Matters_Assigned_To_Me
data.comment: This text is displayed on auto-complete search options for Search Matters

data.name: TemplatesURL
data.comment: This is the URL for templates link.

data.name: Temp_Email_Name
data.comment: This is used to give temporary email name while the email is being created

data.name: WOPIFrameURL
data.comment: This is the URL for the WOPIFrame that allows the user to open the OneNote for a matter

data.name: NoPinnedDocuments
data.comment: This is message for no pinned documents

data.name: NoPinnedMatters
data.comment: This is message for no pinned matters

data.name: DocumentColumnFormatter
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of values for document view on web dashboard whose function definition is already defined

data.name: DocumentColumnValueFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of managed properties for document view on web dashboard, which are used to bind JSON data

data.name: DocumentColumnWidth
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of width of columns for document view on web dashboard

data.name: DocumentHeaderName
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of name of the column headers for document view on web dashboard

data.name: MatterColumnFormatter
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of values for document view on web dashboard whose function definition is already defined

data.name: MatterColumnValueFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of managed properties for document view on web dashboard, which are used to bind JSON data

data.name: MatterColumnWidth
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of width of columns for document view on web dashboard

data.name: MatterHeaderName
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of name of the column headers for document view on web dashboard

data.name: DocumentPinnedColumnValueFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of managed properties for pinned document view on web dashboard, which are used to bind JSON data

data.name: DocumentTitleProperty
data.comment: This is the property name for Document title

data.name: MatterIDPropertyForDocument
data.comment: This is the property name for matter ID

data.comment: This is the property name for matter ID

data.comment: This is the property name for Matter title

data.comment: This is the property name for document title

data.comment: This is the property name for matter title

data.comment: This is the property name for client ID

data.comment: Property name for document extension

data.comment: Property name for document OWA URL

data.comment: Property name for document path

data.name: DocumentSPWebUrl
data.comment: Property name for document SPWebURL

data.name: NonDataColumns
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of columns which do not represent data items in web dashboard

data.name: ItemsPerPage
data.comment: Number of rows to fetch in a single request to display in grid view control.

data.name: DocumentDetailsAction
data.comment: Text to be displayed on Document details button on Documents fly out

data.name: DocumentOpenAction
data.comment: Text to be displayed on Open document button on Documents fly out

data.name: MatterDetailsAction
data.comment: Text to be displayed on Matter details button on Matter fly out

data.name: MatterUploadAction
data.comment: Text to be displayed on Upload button on Matter fly out

data.name: Search_Page_URL
data.comment: This is the URL to be used for enterprise level search
